Plus {{item:3159}}  or {{item:3154}}

Support Champ Idea:
Q - Heals allied champ AND the caster
w - Passive increases armour but can be active to cause damage (scales of armour)
E - Single target stun based on proximity to target
R - AOE Damage to enemies plus a minor increase to ad+ap of allies.

Also if its played once within two seasons and is mildly effective you cannot nerf it.
you could've just said Taric.

ive always loved the champion art in LoL been playing games on systems since 1984 and watched the development of games and graphics since home systems were available. Id like to see some more cinematic's.  :P

Make a champ like Neji Hyuga off of Naruto Shippuden!
Melee Fighter
Q - Force Palm (skill shot)
W - Increases Vision (in a Line mostly and a little around him)
E - Rotation (blocks projectiles and blocks damage dealt scaling with level)
R - 8 Trigram 64 Palms (like Warwicks ult but Silences them instead of suppressing)
Considerate Please!!!
